short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes comments that have been unrated or negatively rated by other people. Saving you from ever having to waste your time on them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tweet comments or suggestions of any sites that you think need to be included to @happy_comments!

A Lurker's best friend!

Do you find yourself getting angry reading negative or downright idiotic comments? 

Do you waste too much time when a petty online argument dissolves into childish name calling and you just can't NOT read the entire thread?  

Wouldn't it be nice if you never had to see those comments at all? 

This extension effectively removes comments that have been downvoted by other users, preventing you from getting caught up in useless threads and leaving you more time to spend on whatever it is that makes you happy!


Works for YouTube, Disqus Comments, Facebook Comment Plugins and more!
